name: Kimberly Hart - Pretty in Pink Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Other than being the original pink Ranger, which other color Ranger was Kimberly during "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers"?
questions.explanation:
blue.

	In the episode "Switching Places" Kimberly and Billy (the blue Ranger) switched bodies. That made Kimberly the blue Ranger for that episode. She used the blue power coin and piloted the Triceratops Zord.

questions.text: When not fighting as a Power Ranger, what did Kimberly do for fun?
options: She baked cookies and cakes for the homeless.
questions.explanation:
She was a gymnast.

	Kimberly was a world class gymnast, which in turn made her a better fighter during her time as a Power Ranger. Kimberly started in the show being portrayed as somewhat of an airhead and slowly evolved into a three dimensional character.

questions.text: Which Zord did Kimberly pilot in the first season of "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers"?
questions.explanation:
Pterodactyl Dinozord.

	During her time as a Power Ranger she also drove the Firebird Thunderzord, and the Crane Ninjazord. Her first zord, however, was the Pterodactyl Dinozord. All three were flying zords.

questions.text: Why did Kimberly give up her powers?
questions.correct: She left to compete at the Pan Global Games.
options: She broke her leg and couldn't be a Ranger.
She lost her power coin and the ability to morph in a fight with a monster.
questions.explanation:
She left to compete at the Pan Global Games.

	World class gymnastics coach Gunthar Schmidt recruited her to join his stable of athletes. She moved to Florida to train with him for the Pan Global Games. Katherine Hilliard replaced her as the pink Ranger.

questions.text: Which other Ranger did Kimberly have a romantic relationship with?
questions.explanation:
Tommy.

	Kimberly and Tommy seemed to fall in love at first sight, even before Tommy officially joined the team as the sixth Ranger. The two maintained a relationship for all three seasons they appeared together on "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers".

questions.text: How did Kimberly's relationship with her fellow Ranger end?
questions.correct: She sent him a letter after moving away.
options: One of them was killed in battle.
He dumped her after she was seen kissing another guy.
They decided that they couldn't date and fight evil.
questions.explanation:
She sent him a letter after moving away.

	She had already left the show when producers decided they needed to end the relationship between her and Tommy. Amy Jo Johnson wasn't available to return to the show, so instead they ended the relationship with a letter in which she explained that she had met someone else in Florida.

questions.text: Did Kimberly ever drive a shark cycle?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	She piloted the pink shark cycle. Each of the six motorcycles had been made out of a prehistoric shark fin and were used in season three of "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers". Kat, her replacement, never got to drive her shark cycle as they weren't used again after she took over the powers.

questions.text: Who was Kimberly's best friend, and fellow Ranger?
questions.explanation:
Trini.

	Trini was the original yellow Ranger. Kimberly and Trini were shown doing most everything together while they were not morphed.  It was on the "MMPR: Fan Club" video where they explicitly called Trini her best friend.

questions.text: Which "Power Rangers" series did Kimberly never appear in?
questions.explanation:
Wildforce.

	The character was in both big screen "Power Rangers" movies, and every episode of the first two seasons of "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers", and most of the third season. She appeared in "Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie" and archived footage of two episodes of the series. She appeared in flashbacks on "Zeo" and "Dino Thunder" and appeared in morphed form only in an episode of "Super Megaforce".

questions.text: Kimberly was briefly the bride and evil queen beside Lord Zedd.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Zedd wanted her to be his queen before he married Rita Repulsa, but the evil spell he used failed to overtake her. She was kidnapped and held hostage for a short while, but was eventually rescued by her fellow Rangers.
